text:
[Verse]
Got sunshine in my pocket
Feel the rhythm every day
Smiling faces all around me
We will dance the night away

[Verse 2]
City lights are shining bright
Underneath the starry sky
Everybody feeling alright
Raise your hands and touch the sky

[Chorus]
Oh oh oh
Jump into the sky
Oh oh oh
Let's just fly so high

[Verse 3]
Music pumping through the speakers
Feel that beat just take control
All our worries getting weaker
Let's just lose ourselves and roll

[Verse 4]
Every moment here together
Feel the love that's in the air
Living now like it's forever
All these memories we'll share

[Chorus]
Oh oh oh
Jump into the sky
Oh oh oh
Let's just fly so high
title: Sunshine in My Pocket
